alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; San German (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 10 at 4:40PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding and ponding of water on roads and poor drainage areas caused by excessive rainfall will continue as well as quick rises along rivers and streams. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Cabo Rojo, Hormigueros and San German. * WHEN...Until 445 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. Excessive runoff from recent heavy rains. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 340 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
